lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Economics Ministry has been controlled by the liberal Free Democrat Party, junior partner in the centre-right coalition government and increasingly in favour of deregulation.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: An advisory commission, in a report late last year to the Economics Ministry, urged implementation of the five pct proposed by the Monopolies Commission to promote competition and avoid interest conflicts.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Furthermore the West German Supreme Court recently supported an action by a private Deutsche shareholder demanding more transparency in the bank's balance sheet.
